question: How can I reset my password?
answer: You can reset your password by clicking on the 'Forgot password?' link on the login page and following the instructions sent to your email.

question: What is your refund policy?
answer: We offer a full refund within 30 days of purchase if you are not satisfied with our product. Please contact customer service for more details.

question: Do you offer technical support?
answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 technical support for all our customers. You can reach out to us via email, phone, or live chat.

question: Can I change my subscription plan at any time?
answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your subscription plan at any time from your account settings page.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: You can cancel your subscription by navigating to your account settings and selecting the cancel subscription option. If you need any assistance, our customer support team is here to help.
